=== NC LoCo Logo Ideas ===

We are in need of a Logo for the Team.  Below are the ideas that have been submitted.

=== Concept ===

To decide on a logo, using one of the ones suggested or by combining the Logo's to come up with one that the whole team deems appropriate for the NC LoCo Team.
